metadata.name: 『KOMODO DRAGON』Wildlife Leography #01/50
metadata.description:
24-year-old animal photographer. Sponsorship will be used for better take photo of NFT. / Unlock content to unlock buyer-only portfolio site!

This collection documents 100% wild, free, un-baited wildlife in Hokkaido of Japan as captured by nature photographer Leo Takahashi. Photographs of animal behavior, habitat, and traces. A photo that simply captures their portrait, etc.The collection includes a variety of nature photography.There were many challenges involved in creating this collection. knowledge of the subjects behavior, using the available light, implementing correct photograph techniques. On the other hand, there is also a miracle shot taken by chance encounter, accidental light conditions, and shutter speed.

Photo exhibitions are also held regularly. and the works will be sold as NFTs even in real places in the future.

The profits earned from this NFT will be used to take better Japanese and foreign photographic works.
